Sentencas: A high performance feedback controller has been developed to minimize SOFC spatial temperature variation following significant load perturbations.
Titulo: Feedback control of solid oxide fuel cell spatial temperature variation

Sentencas: For thermal management, spatial temperature variation along SOFC cannot be avoided.
Titulo: Feedback control of solid oxide fuel cell spatial temperature variation

Sentencas: However, results indicate that feedback control can be used to manipulate the fuel cell air flow and inlet fuel cell air temperature to maintain a nearly constant SOFC electrode electrolyte assembly temperature profile.
Titulo: Feedback control of solid oxide fuel cell spatial temperature variation

Sentencas: For example temperature variations of less than 5 K are obtained for load perturbations of +/- 25% from nominal.
Titulo: Feedback control of solid oxide fuel cell spatial temperature variation

Sentencas: These results are obtained using a centralized control strategy to regulate a distributed temperature profile and manage actuator interactions.
Titulo: Feedback control of solid oxide fuel cell spatial temperature variation

Sentencas: The controller is based on H-infinity synthesis using a physical based dynamic model of a single co-flow SOFC repeat cell.
Titulo: Feedback control of solid oxide fuel cell spatial temperature variation

Sentencas: The model of the fuel cell spatial temperature response needed for control synthesis was linearized and reduced from nonlinear model of the fuel cell assembly.
Titulo: Feedback control of solid oxide fuel cell spatial temperature variation

Sentencas: A single 11 state feedback linear system tested in the full nonlinear model was found to be effective and stable over a wide fuel cell operating envelope (0.82-0.6 V).
Titulo: Feedback control of solid oxide fuel cell spatial temperature variation

Sentencas: Overall, simulation of the advanced controller resulted in small and smooth monotonic temperature response to rapid and large load perturbations.
Titulo: Feedback control of solid oxide fuel cell spatial temperature variation

Sentencas: This indicates that future SOFC systems can be designed and controlled to have superb load following characteristic with less than previously expected thermal stresses.
Titulo: Feedback control of solid oxide fuel cell spatial temperature variation
